tool_description: Google Web Search API. Search the worldâ€™s information, including webpages, related keywords and more.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Perform a search query using Google Search parameters.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query. You can use Google Search parameters, e.g., 'adele site:youtube.com', 'harry potter filetype:pdf', 'inurl:store', 'ronaldo -cristiano'.

optional_parameters.name: related_keywords
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether to show related keywords. Default is false. Setting to true increases API latency.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to return. The recommended maximum value is 300.
